sqlMap.select: SELECT goods.name, goods.sales, gds_property.id as propertyId, gds_property.sale_price as salePrice, gds_pic.pic_url as picUrl FROM t_gds_property gds_property join t_gds_goods goods on goods.id=gds_property.goods_id join t_gds_goods_pic gds_pic on gds_property.id=gds_pic.property_id order by goods.sales desc limit 0,#listSize#

SELECT DISTINCT goods.category_id as categoryId, goods.name, goods.sales, gds_property.id as propertyId, gds_property.sale_price as salePrice, gds_pic.pic_url as picUrl FROM t_gds_property gds_property join t_gds_goods goods on goods.id=gds_property.goods_id join t_gds_goods_pic gds_pic on gds_property.id=gds_pic.property_id where goods.category_id=#categoryId# order by goods.sales desc
limit #offset#, #pageSize#

SELECT count(1) FROM t_gds_property gds_property join t_gds_goods goods on goods.id=gds_property.goods_id join t_gds_goods_pic gds_pic on gds_property.id=gds_pic.property_id where goods.category_id=#categoryId#

select goods.name, goods.sales, goods.code, goods.detail, goods.status, gds_property.id as propertyId, gds_property.sale_price as salePrice, gds_property.stock, gds_property.property, gds_property.is_discount as isDiscount, gds_property.discount_price as discountPrice, gds_pic.pic_url as picUrl FROM t_gds_property gds_property join t_gds_goods goods on goods.id=gds_property.goods_id join t_gds_goods_pic gds_pic on gds_property.id=gds_pic.property_id where gds_property.id=#goodsId#

select goods.name, goods.sales, goods.code, goods.detail, goods.status, gds_property.id as propertyId, gds_property.sale_price as salePrice, gds_property.stock, gds_property.property, gds_property.is_discount as isDiscount, gds_property.discount_price as discountPrice, gds_pic.pic_url as picUrl FROM t_gds_property gds_property join t_gds_goods goods on goods.id=gds_property.goods_id join t_gds_goods_pic gds_pic on gds_property.id=gds_pic.property_id where gds_property.id=#propertyId#

select goods.is_delete as isDelete, goods.status, gds_property.stock as stoke, gds_property.id as propertyId, goods.name as goodsName, gds_property.property as goodsProperty FROM t_gds_property gds_property join t_gds_goods goods on goods.id=gds_property.goods_id where gds_property.id=#propertyId#
sqlMap.update: update t_gds_property set stock=stock-#stoke# where id=#propertyId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DISTINCT goods.name, goods.sales, gds_property.id as propertyId, gds_property.sale_price as salePrice, gds_pic.pic_url as picUrl FROM t_gds_property gds_property join t_gds_goods goods on goods.id=gds_property.goods_id join t_gds_goods_pic gds_pic on gds_property.id=gds_pic.property_id where goods.name like concat("%",#goodsName#,"%") order by goods.sales desc limit 0, 10
SELECT tag.id, tag.tag tag.sort_num as sortNum FROM t_gds_hot_tag tag order by tag.sort_num asc limit 0, 10
